name: Gunvolt Chronicles: Luminous Avenger iX
description:
"Get ready for the apeX of 2D action!"<br/>
<br/>
Lock-on shots, wall jumping, hovering, air-dashing.<br/>
Use every tool at your disposal to soar through levels and crush the bosses that await you.<br/>
Acquire "EX Weapons" from defeated bosses to expand your arsenal!<br/>
<br/>
Experience high-speed, stylish action like never before. Inti Creates presents the ultimate in classic 2D action with "Luminous Avenger iX"!
